Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a trio of {? | $(this.trait:bead:color) | $(this.trait:bead:color)}{? | $(this.trait:bead:material) | $(this.trait:bead:material)}{? | $(this.trait:bead:type) | $(this.trait:bead:type)}s dangling from the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief)

A trio of {? | $(this.trait:bead:color) | $(this.trait:bead:color)}{? | $(this.trait:bead:material) | $(this.trait:bead:material)}{? | $(this.trait:bead:type) | $(this.trait:bead:type)}s dangle here and there upon fine $(this.trait:material) pins from below the {? | $(this.trait:gempieces:material) | melee encrusted} central setting of the {? | $(this.trait:gem:material) | $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) and} $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) $(this.trait:brief)

Centrally set into the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material), the 11 mm $(this.trait:gem:shape) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) acts as the centerpiece for the otherwise simple brooch. {? | $(this.trait:gempieces:material) | The outer edge of the $(this.trait:gem:shape) setting has been encrusted with the tiniest of $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material)s that gradually dissipate towards the edges, lending the piece an overall dazzling appearance.}

Centrally set into the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material), the 11 mm $(this.trait:gem:shape) $(this.trait:gem:color) $(this.trait:gem:material) acts as the centerpiece for the otherwise simple brooch. {? | $(this.trait:gempieces:material) | The outer edge of the $(this.trait:gem:shape) setting has been encrusted with the tiniest of $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material)s that gradually dissipate towards the edges, lending the piece an overall dazzling appearance.}

Tiny $(this.trait:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:gempieces:material)s encrust the main setting of the $(this.trait:brief), gradually dissipating towards the edges lending the piece an overall dazzling appearance.

A loose-hanging piece of jewelry typically hung via a small loop at its top, from a necklace and various other types of chain jewelries. {? | $(this.trait:pendant:type) | This $(this.trait:pendant:material) pendant has been meticulously shaped into a detailed $(this.trait:pendant:type). | Classically contoured and tasteful, this pendant is bordered with a frame of close-set milgrain edging.} {? | $(this.trait:pendant:gem:material) | The $(this.trait:pendant:color) $(this.trait:pendant:material) has been centrally set with a $(this.trait:pendant:gem:shape) $(this.trait:pendant:gem:color) $(this.trait:pendant:gem:material), within the contours of the $(this.trait:pendant:type) pedant's frame.} The pendant is created in such a way to hang from a matching curled loop of $(this.trait:pendant:material) at its top. {? | $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:material) | Tiny, inset $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:material) melee gems encrust the contoured edges of this pendant, gradually dissipating in number toward the center to lend the piece an overall dazzling appearance.}{? | $(this.trait:pendant:engraving) | $(this.trait:pendant:engraving).}{? | $(this.trait:pendant:etching) | The back of the pendant itself has been etched with $(this.trait:pendant:etching)}

A loose-hanging piece of jewelry typically hung via a small loop at its top, from a necklace and various other types of chain jewelries. {? | $(this.trait:pendant:type) | This $(this.trait:pendant:material) pendant has been meticulously shaped into a detailed $(this.trait:pendant:type). | Classically contoured and tasteful, this pendant is bordered with a frame of close-set milgrain edging.} {? | $(this.trait:pendant:gem:material) | The $(this.trait:pendant:color) $(this.trait:pendant:material) has been centrally set with a $(this.trait:pendant:gem:shape) $(this.trait:pendant:gem:color) $(this.trait:pendant:gem:material), within the contours of the $(this.trait:pendant:type) pedant's frame.} The pendant is created in such a way to hang from a matching curled loop of $(this.trait:pendant:material) at its top. {? | $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:material) | Tiny, inset $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:color) $(this.trait:pendant:gempieces:material) melee gems encrust the contoured edges of this pendant, gradually dissipating in number toward the center to lend the piece an overall dazzling appearance.}{? | $(this.trait:pendant:engraving) | $(this.trait:pendant:engraving).}{? | $(this.trait:pendant:etching) | The back of the pendant itself has been etched with $(this.trait:pendant:etching)}

Core:Properties.Core:Property: ([ "description":(\{ "You shape your brooch into NEW_OBJECT", "shapes a brooch into NEW_OBJECT" \}), "input-list":(\{ (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:shaping-brooch" \}), (\{ \, "alteration:knowledge:shaping-brooch" \}) \}), "input-list-actor":(\{ "alteration:knowledge:shaping-brooch" \}), "newobject-properties":(\{ (\{ "trait:color", "trait:color" \}), (\{ "trait:material", "trait:material" \}), (\{ "trait:quality", "trait:quality" \}) \}), "stopvalue":(\{ "trait:type", nil \}) ])
